title: Earliest Memory
prompt_text: What is the very first thing you can remember? Describe the scene, the smells, and how you felt.

title: Childhood Home
prompt_text: Take me on a tour of your childhood home. What was in your room? What did the kitchen smell like?

title: Best Friend
prompt_text: Who was your best friend growing up? What did you do together?

title: First Love
prompt_text: Tell me about your first crush or first love. How did it feel?

title: Meeting Mom/Dad
prompt_text: How did you meet your spouse/partner? What was your first impression?

title: Proposal Story
prompt_text: How did the proposal happen? Was it a surprise?

title: First Job
prompt_text: What was your first job? How much were you paid, and what did you learn?

title: Career Advice
prompt_text: Looking back at your career, what is the best piece of advice youâ€™d give to your younger self?

title: Hardest Decision
prompt_text: What was the hardest decision you ever had to make? Do you regret it?

title: Happiest Day
prompt_text: Aside from weddings or births, what was one of the happiest days of your life?

title: Historical Events
prompt_text: What historical event had the biggest impact on you? Where were you when it happened?

title: Favorite Tradition
prompt_text: What is a family tradition you hope we keep going forever?

title: Hidden Talent
prompt_text: Do you have a talent or skill that most people don't know about?

title: Perfect Day
prompt_text: Describe your perfect day, from waking up to going to sleep.

title: Bucket List Item
prompt_text: What is one thing still on your bucket list that you are determined to do?

title: Life Philosophy
prompt_text: If you could summarize your philosophy on life in one sentence, what would it be?

title: Forgiveness
prompt_text: Is there anyone you had to forgive, or anyone you wish you had forgiven?

title: Proudest Moment
prompt_text: What is an achievement you are most proud of, big or small?

title: Favorite Song
prompt_text: What song instantly takes you back to a specific moment? Navigate us through it.

title: Advice on Love
prompt_text: What have you learned about love that you wish you knew when you were 20?
